text.section: This section applies to telephone directories distributed by, or on behalf of, a telephone company other than advertisement-based business directories.
A telephone company may not be required to distribute a telephone directory to an address in the State unless the property owner or an occupant requests the telephone directory.

section.section: If a telephone company elects not to distribute a print telephone directory to a customer at an address in the State, the telephone company shall provide notice as to how the customer may request a print telephone directory.

The notice required under paragraph (1) of this subsection shall:
include a toll-free telephone number a customer may call to request a print telephone directory; and
be included:
If a customer requests a print telephone directory, the telephone company shall deliver the print telephone directory to the customer at no cost to the customer.
